name: Fighting Game Prototype (M_acrophage)
description:
This is a working prototype of a fighting game that I'm currently developing. All assets are placeholder and mechanics are subject to change.

Inspired by fast paced, aggressive anime fighters like Guilty Gear, Under Night and Blazblue.

Both local versus and Training mode are available. 

Currently there is no keyboard support, but I will upload a new version once that becomes available.

See the readme file in the zip folder for controls and system mechanics.
